Articles.Title: Cristine Brache, Perceived
Articles.Description:
It's here, everything - 

Everything anyone ever 

Dreamed of, and more. 

But love is lost:

The only sacrifice 

To live in this heaven, 

This Disneyland 

Where people are the games.
